messages.content:
We are studying attention heads in a transformer architecture neural network. Each attention head looks for some particular thing in a short document.
This attention head in particular helps to predict that the next token is " too", but it is only active in some documents and not others. Look at the documents and explain what makes the attention head active, taking into consideration the inactive examples.
Examples where the attention head is active: """
* not only become an advocate for yourself, but for others as too
* not limited to just music however, but other areas of the entertainment business as too
* as well?  Not only phone but my iPad as too
* not just motivated to achieve their own success, but to help you achieve yours as too
* not only to your spiritual health but to your physical health as too
*Maybe we should do that for PvP as too
* not just for the environment, but for the pocketbook as too
* not only for the body but it's for the mind and spirit as too
* vulnerable, although their problem isn't the direct impact on imports, which only make up 9 percent of auto sales in China.  Chrysler is a bit vulnerable as too
*This point is important, because the regulatory relaxations that goes alongside these tax reliefs often relate to employee protection; exemption from minimum wage and other employment rules; relaxation of health and safety requirements and even relaxed rules on product standards. All of those are a licence to abuse of course, and not just employees but consumers as too
* against walls -- though they have to do that with books as too
* not only stop at this, but other spin-offs are created as too
* [Obamacare], and that goes for the middle-income group as too
* notice that they don’t feel well rested when they wake up and are sleepy throughout the day. Their bed partners are likely to notice, too
*It looks like "Destiny 2" will continue this trend, but its availability could expand to the PC as too
"""
Examples where the attention head is inactive: """
*I'm so glad that Satchel stepped up to help and that he did it with Tarah."Others have stepped up as too
* love being a part of this and I hope you do too
* First, just as you can pass a string or a number as an argument to a function, so too
* has been microchipped and I would encourage other owners to do the too
* That, friends, is what is know as having your cake and eating it too
* find myself paying a lot more attention to holes in trees, and hopefully lots of other people will too
* broken and no one repairs it, soon all the others will be broken as too
*(\dot x\bigr)(t).$$ Now you can also apply this to the oscillator equation, $G(\ddot x+\omega^2x)=\ddot y+ω^2y$ and if $x$ is sinusoid with frequency $ω$, then so too
*As the demand for luxury packaging has increased, so too
*As computer systems grow ever more powerful and complex, so too
*. As CFC production swelled to meet the global demand for aerosol and refrigeration, so too
* Just as the attempted assassination of Bran Stark has had a myriad of consequences, so too
* course." "As long as you're happy, I'm happy too
* sub and have posted that several times. It was a great sub, and I'm sure the new 15" is good too
* As the rhetoric at Palin's rallies has ratcheted up, so too
"""
